actions.name: Distraction
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: All valid creatures in range lose -1 SPDEF Stage for 5 Activations and -1 ACC Stage for 2 Activations. The user's Fast Talk Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
